info.name: Ask.fm Flat Original Theme
info.description: Theme for Ask.fm with flat design and original colors. No ads, no gradients, user-friendly.
info.additionalInfo:
11.06.15 - Fix social links in question box and delete button. Slightly rounded buttons and some more fixes.

24.04.15 - New view for profile photo! And restyled search page.

18.04.15 - Returned and restyled popup window with gifts, some fixed bugs.

15.04.15 - Start.
